mapper.select: select a.*, b.nickname as userName, b.phone as userPhone, c.org_name from xry_teacher a LEFT JOIN xry_user b on a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN xry_organization c on a.org_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
